thread.title: Re: Jonah Goldberg, Brit Hume, Megyn Kelly and others remember Alan Colmes, dead at 66
thread.title_full: Re: Jonah Goldberg, Brit Hume, Megyn Kelly and others remember Alan Colmes, dead at 66

author: LucienCordier
title: Re: Jonah Goldberg, Brit Hume, Megyn Kelly and others remember Alan Colmes, dead at 66
text:
Jonah Goldberg, Brit Hume, Megyn Kelly and others remember Alan Colmes, dead at 66 Posted at 10:00 am on February 23, 2017 by Greg P. 
There’s some sad news to report this morning as Fox News contributor Alan Colmes has died at the age of 66: Fox News Channel's Alan Colmes Dies at Age 66 https://t.co/H56dUV9elS pic.twitter.com/uaRSNsLNGG 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 23, 2017 
From Fox News: 
Alan Colmes passed away this morning after a brief illness. He was 66-years-old. He leaves his adoring and devoted wife, Jocelyn Elise Crowley. He was a great guy, brilliant, hysterical, and moral. He was fiercely loyal, and the only thing he loved more than his work was his life with Jocelyn. He will be missed. The family has asked for privacy during this very difficult time. 
Alan’s colleagues at Fox News, as well as many others, have taken to Twitter to express their condolences. Whoa. Alan Colmes died. We sparred a bunch, but decent guy. RIP. 
— Jonah Goldberg (@JonahNRO) February 23, 2017 So sad to hear of the death of Fox News colleague Alan Colmes. He and I agreed on little, but I liked him immensely. Good guy. R.I.P. 
— Brit Hume (@brithume) February 23, 2017 Heartbroken my friend Alan Colmes has died. He lit up the FNC halls w/his kindness & humor. Incredibly positive force. Prayers 4 his family. 
— Megyn Kelly (@megynkelly) February 23, 2017 Alan Colmes was always a gentleman…always kind…a wonderful colleague. pic.twitter.com/VxQimzE3bZ 
— Greta Van Susteren (@greta) February 23, 2017 “I don’t think it’s our business what people do in their personal lives…” – Alan Colmes, R.I.P. https://t.co/NUghugn1wU 
— Adam Baldwin (@AdamBaldwin) February 23, 2017 Just heard of death of Alan Colmes; the kind of liberal I loved-smart, witty, and fair; never backed up, but always backed up his views. RIP 
— Gov. Mike Huckabee (@GovMikeHuckabee) February 23, 2017 two respected colleagues lost this week. rest in peace Brenda Buttner & Alan Colmes. love, prayer and strength to your families.
